title: Independent Building - new Cottage:2.Br, No Neighbors adjacent
posting_body: Consider: moving in, be the first resident, no one has been occupied yet, thanks to no social links, appreciate a reply with phone number and the best time you can be reached, Amenity interior and New looking exterior, new Door,  new Furnace, New large window, New painting, New Insulation, newer applicants, No neighbors in next, Fruits trees, large courtyard, gate in, energy-saving W/D, free street parking always is available, walk to free carpool, Bart, Bus, by foot to get anything you want, easy access Hwy I-80, 580, leads 980, 101, 880, very quiet, no pets, no any kinds of the smoker, 2 Good size Br with closet, bookshelves,  Huge dining, also can arrange a cozy computer room, it is detached, alone, no sharing, Renter pays all utilities, rent $2099.01+1, deposit $2100.00, reply with phone number and the best time you can be reached, touch bases first, the suitable candidate will schedule a view, prefer no text,  a short chatting, move forward Thanks
